description: A Flutter provider class managing notes and tags, interfacing with a database helper for CRUD operations.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class providing state management for notes and tags in a Flutter application.

methods.name: loadNotes
methods.description: Fetches notes from database based on current search query and active tag, then notifies listeners.

methods.name: loadTags
methods.description: Fetches all tags from the database and updates internal state.

methods.name: setSearchQuery
methods.description: Sets the current search query string and reloads notes accordingly.

methods.name: setActiveTag
methods.description: Sets the current active tag ID and reloads notes.

methods.name: addOrUpdateNote
methods.description: Adds a new note or updates an existing one, then refreshes notes and tags.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes specified note and refreshes notes and tags.

methods.name: addTag
methods.description: Inserts a new tag into the database if the name is not empty, then reloads tags.
